body_html: @jgong5 , can you briefly explain why Broadwell doesn't support int8 inference? I think both need to use vpmaddubsw and vpmaddwd instructions, and based on my understanding throughput of those instructions in Broadwell and Skylake are the same? Or is it mostly because of the engineering efforts to implement both AVX2 and AVX512?

body: @jgong5 , can you briefly explain why Broadwell doesn't support int8 inference? I think both need to use  vpmaddubsw and vpmaddwd instructions, and based on my understanding throughput of those instructions in Broadwell and Skylake are the same? Or is it mostly because of the engineering efforts to implement both AVX2 and AVX512?
